description:
Simon will talk about the principles, practice and pitfalls of creating Data Pipelines, as covered in our new Data Pipeline Playbook.

After his talk there will be an open discussion with Lewis Gaskin (John Lewis & Partners) and others about their experiences with creating and using Data Pipelines in their own organisations.

**
SPEAKER:
Simon Case
Data Practice Lead, Equal Experts

Panelist:

Lewis Gaskin
Senior Product Owner, John Lewis & Partners

***
This talk will be recorded and a link to the recording placed in the Comments shortly after the event
***
title: Principles, practice and pitfalls of creating Data Pipelines
